original_text:
But before they had satisfied their craving,
    while the food was still in their mouths,
korean_text: 그러나 그들이 그들의 욕심을 버리지 아니하여 그들의 먹을 것이 아직 그들의 입에 있을 때에

sentences.original_text: But before they had satisfied their craving,
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들이 그 욕망을 채우기도 전에,

sentences.original_text: while the food was still in their mouths,
sentences.korean_translation: 음식이 아직 입 안에 있을 때,
